4. Mayor

Mayor
=====

Welcome to Bridgeport,

As Mayor and on behalf of our citizens, I am pleased to welcome you to Bridgeport. Located approximately 45 miles northwest of Fort Worth, Bridgeport is one of the largest cities in Wise County. It is close enough to the big-city amenities of DFW yet distant enough to provide a small-town lifestyle. Bridgeport has a rich history, hometown values, and a strong community.

If you are a visitor to Bridgeport, I hope you will take the time to explore Bridgeport's unique experiences. We encourage citizens and visitors to enjoy the many sights and attractions that highlight our community. Such as eating and shopping in our newly revitalized historic downtown or exploring our OHV (off-highway vehicle) Park; there is something for everyone in Bridgeport.

If you are moving to the area for work, school, or simply a great quality of life, we are excited to say that Bridgeport is a growing community that offers an ideal environment for families and businesses to grow and prosper. You will notice that Bridgeport is rich in history and family- and community-oriented. We offer excellent educational opportunities, affordable housing, and safe neighborhoods.

My highest priority is to serve our citizens. As a municipal government, we exist because of the citizens, and it is our distinct duty and honor to serve them with respect and care.

Again, it is my pleasure to welcome you to our city. Bridgeport is a special place to visit, work, live, and raise a family!

Sincerely,

Randy Singleton  
Mayor of Bridgeport  
[Email](http://www.cityofbridgeport.net/578/rsingleton@cityofbrodgeport.net)
